page_content: The page discusses the rising water levels of the Rhein river and the measures taken to manage the situation.
The page provides information on BKOnline, a platform for forestry operations, including how to access it and technical support.
The page discusses the successful evaluation of WOV pilot projects, including the development and sale of software to improve state services.
The page discusses the approval of election protocols and mentions the helpful role of provided software solutions for electronic voting.
The page discusses a concept for a coordination center for IT services aimed at providing a unified IT platform for municipalities.
